required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study to Evaluate ACT-132577 in Healthy Subjects and in People With Severe Kidney Disease
clinical_study.official_title: A Single-center, Open Label, Single-dose Study to Investigate the Effect of Severe Renal Impairment on the Pharmacokinetics of ACT-132577

brief_summary.textblock: The primary purpose of this study is to investigate the fate of ACT-132577 in healthy subjects and in people with severe kidney disease

primary_outcome.time_frame: From baseline to up to 16 days
primary_outcome.description: Cmax of ACT-132577 will be derived by non-compartmental analysis of the plasma concentration-time profiles

primary_outcome.measure: Area under the plasma concentration-time curves during a dosing interval [AUC(0-t)] of ACT-132577
primary_outcome.time_frame: From baseline to up to 16 days
primary_outcome.description: AUC(0-T) of ACT-132577 will be derived by non-compartmental analysis of the plasma concentration-time profiles

primary_outcome.measure: Area under the plasma concentration-time curves from time 0 to inf [AUC(0-inf)]
primary_outcome.time_frame: From baseline to up to 16 days
primary_outcome.description: AUC(0-inf) of ACT-132577 will be derived by non-compartmental analysis of the plasma concentration-time profiles

secondary_outcome.measure: Time to reach Cmax (tmax) of ACT-132577
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From baseline to up to 16 days
secondary_outcome.description: tmax of ACT-132577 will be derived by non-compartmental analysis of the plasma concentration-time profiles

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From baseline to up to 16 days
secondary_outcome.description: t1/2 of ACT-132577 will be derived by non-compartmental analysis of the plasma concentration-time profiles

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From baseline to up to 16 days
secondary_outcome.description: The percentage of subjects with treatment-emergent adverse events will be reported

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence of adverse events leading to premature discontinuation of study treatment
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From baseline to up to 16 days
secondary_outcome.description: The number of subjects who prematurely discontinued the study treatment due to an adverse event will be reported

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence of any clinical relevant findings in ECG variables
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From baseline to up to 16 days
secondary_outcome.description: The number of subjects with any treatment-emergent electrocardiogram (ECG) abnormalities will be reported

arm_group.description: 8 healthy subjects and 8 subjects with severe renal function impairment will receive a single oral dose of 50 mg ACT-132577 administered as capsule following an overnight fast
